entries.meaning: Agent noun of bait; one who baits, as a fishhook.
examples: The baiter stands amidships, with the bait-box outside the rail: with a tin pint nailed to a long handle he begins throwing out bait, while every man stands to his berth.

entries.meaning: (Internet, slang) A troll who deliberately posts aggravating messages on a message board to elicit responses.
